thread.title: ‘Lost in Space’ Review: Re-entering the TV Atmosphere

author: John Anderson
title: ‘Lost in Space’ Review: Re-entering the TV Atmosphere
text:
The folks behind the new “Lost in Space” have essentially done what a car mechanic once advised me to do with my 1966 Oldsmobile Jetstar 88: Jack up the radiator cap and slide a new car underneath. What else could they do? Television is awash in remakes right now, and if you’re doing “Howards End,” say, or even “Roseanne,” there’s a reasonable concern about fealty to the source material. But the campy old “Lost in Space”? It never even knew what it wanted to be. So you might say the Netflix reboot has a leg up
Whether the...
